body:
It's been a while since I last installed Radiance - so memory may be
hazy - but I believe you may need to create the /tmp directory and
set permissions also.
-John

PS.  X11 on Leopard is a little clunky.  If you start it from an X11
icon in the dock, you may end up with two X11 icons.  Which doesn't
hurt, but it is annoying nonetheless.  The workaround I stumbled upon
was to drag the X11 application icon to the lower-left pane of the
Finder (i.e. making a  shortcut X11 icon), and then starting X11 from
that.
